Plot: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the faeries and save the spirit world.
Title: Song of the Sea
Actors: David Rawle, Brendan Gleeson, Lisa Hannigan, Fionnula Flanagan
tomatoConsensus: Song of the Sea boasts narrative depth commensurate with its visual beauty, adding up to an animated saga overflowing with family-friendly riches.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 17 nominations.
